core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix creative coding (Lusion) with functional clarity (Lenis).
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel 'cinematic' and 'premium'.
Content is King: The narrative is 'From Roots to Stars' (History -> Future).
Zoom In: Use macro-typography and immersive 3D details.
Negative Space: Luxurious padding (py-32) to let the WebGL breathe.
anti_patterns: No static gradients; use moving/living textures.

scale.h1: text-6xl md:text-8xl lg:text-[10rem] font-black tracking-tighter leading-[0.8]
scale.label: text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-accent

buttons.primary: relative px-8 py-4 bg-white text-black font-bold rounded-full overflow-hidden hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300
buttons.secondary: px-6 py-3 border border-white/20 rounded-full hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors backdrop-blur-md
buttons.ghost: text-sm font-mono uppercase tracking-widest hover:text-primary transition-colors

cards.glass: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-8 hover:border-white/20 transition-colors

navigation.classes: fixed bottom-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-2xl border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-3 flex gap-8 z-50

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a fixed 'noise' overlay with opacity-5 pointer-events-none z-[9999].

motion.scroll: Lenis smooth scroll is MANDATORY. Configure with duration: 1.2, easing: (t) => Math.min(1, 1.001 - Math.pow(2, -10 * t))

3d_scenes.name: Hero Transformation
3d_scenes.description: A geometric mesh (Icosahedron) that morphs into the 'Gradient' logo or a fluid abstract shape on scroll.

3d_scenes.name: Space Travel
3d_scenes.description: Particle tunnel effect before the footer. Speed increases as user scrolls near the bottom.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES FIRST: `npm install @react-three/fiber @react-three/drei three framer-motion gsap @studio-freight/lenis lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge`
2. SETUP LENIS: Wrap the entire application in a Lenis provider or initialize it in App.js/App.tsx.
3. IMPLEMENT 3D HERO: Create a `Scene.js` component. Do not block the main thread. Use `Suspense`.
4. USE TAILWIND ARBITRARY VALUES: For specific creative layouts, use `w-[40vw]` or `rotate-[15deg]` freely.
5. NO WHITE BACKGROUNDS: The site must be strictly dark mode.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, links, inputs).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts.
Dark colors only: No light mode toggle.
Micro-animations: Every hover must trigger a scale, color shift, or glow.
